Detailed Description

The namespace LogFile contains functions for managing a log file:

Clearing the log. Reading the contents of the log. Writing formatted data to the log.

Variable Documentation

char * LogFile::currentLogFile = "./log.txt"
 

Logfile.cpp

This file contains a set of functions for writing and reading to/from a log file. Specify which file to use with the function setLogFile.
